name: TheConsumerist(FlashBriefing)
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Consumer advocacy site responding to the latest consumer news and trends. - The Consumerist.

Receive daily updates from The Consumerist in your Flash Briefing. This app is simply a reader of The Consumerist public rss feed intended for users daily Flash Briefings. 

The developer of this skill is in no way officially affiliated with "Consumer Reports" or "The Consumerist", and has no plans of monetization, or anything other than the Flash Briefing operation of "The Consumerist's" public rss feed.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
